pullrequest.title: Remove redundant call of WorldPlugin::Init from gazebo_2.2 branch (#1208)

content.raw:
The World::LoadPlugin function is public, which means it can be called from another plugin. If that happens, this pull-request would mean the new plugin's Init function will never be called.

I think we could remove the init loop in World::LoadPlugins, although I haven't tested it.
content.html:
The World::LoadPlugin function is public, which means it can be called from another plugin. If that happens, this pull-request would mean the new plugin's Init function will never be called.

I think we could remove the init loop in World::LoadPlugins, although I haven't tested it.
